product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Vapor Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Vapor Hydration Pack keeps your thirst quenched with 100 fl. oz. water capacity, along with room for your essential gear while you enjoy a day in the great outdoors. Hydration pocket and port accommodate the included 3-liter bladder with insulated tube. Front stretch neoprene pockets; side neoprene water-bottle pocket. The ALPS Mountaineering Vapor Hydration Pack features a padded back panel with air-flow channel and a rescue whistle on the sternum strap's buckle. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Vapor Hydration Pack keeps your thirst quenched with 100 fl. oz. water capacity, along with room for your essential gear while you enjoy a day in the great outdoors.
